title: The Birth of Modern Advertising
description: A quick win: understand The Birth of Modern Advertising.

hook.text: Before 1920, ads listed product features. Then Edward Bernays said: sell the feeling, not the thing.

twist.text: Bernays didn't sell products â€” he sold identities. Buying became a way to express who you wanted to be.
